title: `Lordy, I hope there are tapes.' James Comey, Trump and DC's big dramas
shortDescription: From the 9/11 terrorist attacks to the 2016 election and the tempestuous Trump administrations, James Comey has been at the center of pivotal events.

title: Trump says he hopes 'there are others' charged
shortDescription: Trump said he hopes “there are others” who get charged following former FBI Director James Comey’s indictment by a federal grand jury on Sept. 25.

title: Trump announced new drug tariffs. How much more will you pay?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced 100% tariffs on brand drugs. Companies that build a U.S. manufacturing plant will be exempt.

title: Meet James Comey's judge: Trump already has doubts
shortDescription: Less than a day after federal prosecutors announced charges against James Comey, President Trump already cast doubt on the judge in the case.

title: Cheers and jeers over James Comey's Trump-fueled indictment
shortDescription: A federal grand jury has indicted former FBI Director James Comey on charges of lying to Congress and obstruction.

title: Donald Trump, Jeffrey Epstein statue removed from National Mall
shortDescription: The National Park Service has removed a 12ft statue depicting President Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein as 'friends'. The two were holding hands.

title: Trump headed to the Ryder Cup. How many days has he golfed this year?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is headed to the Ryder Cup on Sept. 26. He has attended several sporting events as president. How much has Trump golfed?

title: Trump administration sues 6 states over voter rolls
shortDescription: The department has requested copies of voter rolls, often with non-public information, from multiple states.

title: Trump hits drugs, trucks with new tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced 100% tariffs on branded drugs and new duties on trucks, furniture and cabinets.

title: Trump slaps fresh tariffs on heavy trucks, drugs and kitchen cabinets
shortDescription: Tariffs have been a feature of Trump's second term, with duties on trading partners ranging from 10% to 50% and on a wide variety of products.

title: Obama calls out Trump admin's autism statement
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama told a crowd at an event in London that the Trump administration’s announcement linking autism with Tylenol use amounted to “violence against the truth.”

title: Trump signs EO for TikTok’s $14B US deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to help finalize TikTok’s $14B U.S. deal with Oracle as on board as security provider.

title: Trump targets 'left-wing terrorism' with presidential memorandum
shortDescription: "We are properly going to chase them down like the domestic terrorists that they are," FBI Director Kash Patel said.

title: Biden snubbed at "Presidential Walk of Fame" installed in White House.
shortDescription: Presidential portraits now hang along the colonnade near the Oval Office. In lieu of former President Biden's photo, there's a picture of an autopen.

title: Trump signs off on TikTok deal that values US app at $14 billion
shortDescription: White House officials said earlier this week that TikTok reached a preliminary deal to sell its U.S. operations to an American-based investor group.

title: 'Very dangerous': Hillary Clinton slams Trump over punishing opponents
shortDescription: The former secretary of state called the Trump administration's use of government against political foes “right out of the authoritarian playbook.”
